cells.source:
# City Resilience Profiling Tool - Data

### Context

geographical, historical, climate, population (density, distribution), land use, sub-local and supra-local divisions, green and blue spaces, economy, local government organization, etc.

### Indicators

about 400 specific indicators of relevant aspects of the urban system. (e.g. street density, percentage of urban footprint located in hazardous areas, % of households connected to a wastewater network).

### Challenges in data collection

* No data sources with detailed information at local level.
* No sharing culture inside local governments and with other stakeholders.
* Accuracy and reliability of information gathered from local sources.

### Data sources

* SDG Indicators Database: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/dataportal/database
* UN Data: https://data.un.org/

cells.name: un-crpt-data-teresina_priority_matters_indicators
cells.source:
def csv_file_priority_matters_indicators = """

teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.2.2;Total number of business establishments per square kilometre;Orange
teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.2.3;Proportion of total businesses that can be classified as informal (by sector if possible);Red
teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.3.1;Diversity index for local employment using local employment composition by sector;Yellow
teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.3.2;Unemployment rate (disaggregate by sex, education, and age, if possible) -;Red

teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.3.6;Are worker training and retraining programs available for city inhabitants?;Green
teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.4.2;Proportion of the households below the poverty line (disaggregate by sex of householder, if possible)?;Red
teresina;Economic Underperformance;7;7.1;7.1.4.3;Provide GINI Coefficient at the local level the last year available;Red
